amendment.description: Amendment requires the Commission on Unfunded Federal Mandates to investigate and review the role that unfunded State and local mandates have on local governments, the private sector, and individuals.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require the commission to investigate and review the role of unfunded state and local mandates on local governments, the private sector, and individuals. (The text of the amendment was printed in the Congressional Record on Jan. 18, 1995 as amendment No. 13.).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fattah amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
